TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AL extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension

summary.span: 此类定义了 "AL" XMake 任务，使用 al.exe 可以将模块和资源文件链接到程序集。

span.span: This class defines the "AL" XMake task, which enables using al.exe to link modules and resource files into assemblies.

Protected Friend Overrides Sub AddResponseFileCommands (commandLine As CommandLineBuilderExtension)

param.name: commandLine

span.span: Command line builder to add arguments to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlgorithmId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlgorithmId : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一种算法来对多文件程序集中的所有文件（包含程序集清单的文件除外）进行哈希处理。

span.span: Gets or sets an algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 对多文件程序集中的所有文件（包含程序集清单的文件除外）进行哈希处理的算法。

span.span: The algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/algid` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/algid` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseAddress : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个地址，运行时将在用户计算机上的此地址加载 DLL。

span.span: Gets or sets the address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user's computer at run time.

value.span: 在运行时将在用户计算机上的其上加载 DLL 的地址。

span.span: The address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user's computer at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 DLL 的基址，而不是让操作系统在进程空间内重新定位 DLL，则应用程序的加载速度会更快。Applications load faster if you specify the base address of the DLLs, rather than letting the operating system relocate the DLLs in the process space. 此属性对应于 [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的/base [address] 选项。This property corresponds to the /base[address] option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是仅将公钥放在程序集 () 中还是对程序集 () 进行完全签名。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to place only the public key in the assembly () or to fully sign the assembly ().

value.span: 如果仅将公钥放在该程序集，为 ；如果对程序集进行完全签名，则为 。

span.span: if only the public key is placed in the assembly; if the assembly is fully signed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/descr[iption]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/descr[iption]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ EmbedResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.EmbedResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在包含程序集清单的映像中嵌入的资源。

span.span: Gets or sets the resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 要在包含程序集清单的映像中嵌入的资源。

span.span: The resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此任务将资源文件的内容复制到映像。This task copies the contents of the resource file into the image. 此属性中设置的项可能具有附加到它们的可选元数据，这些元数据称为 `LogicalName` 和 `Access` 。The items set in this property may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName` and `Access`. `LogicalName` 元数据用于指定资源的内部标识符。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. `Access` 元数据可以设置为 `private`，以使该资源对其他程序集不可见。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/embed[resource]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/embed[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EvidenceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EvidenceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在资源名称为 Security.Evidence 的程序集中嵌入的文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

value.span: 要嵌入到资源名称为 Security. 证据的程序集中的文件。

span.span: The file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能对常规资源使用 `Security.Evidence`。You cannot use `Security.Evidence` for regular resources. 此属性对应于 `/e[vidence]` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/e[vidence]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

member this.GenerateFullPaths : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否使任务对错误消息中报告的任何文件都使用绝对路径。

span.span: if the task will use the absolute path for any files that are reported in an error message; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyContainer { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyContainer : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置保存密钥对的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.

value.span: 保存密钥对的容器。

span.span: The container that holds a key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这样将会通过将公钥插入程序集清单来对程序集签名（为它指定一个强名称）。This will sign the assembly (give it a strong name) by inserting a public key into the assembly manifest. 然后，此任务使用私钥对最终程序集进行签名。The task will then sign the final assembly with the private key. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/keyn[ame]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyn[ame]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个文件，该文件包含密钥对或只包含用于对程序集进行签名的公钥。

span.span: Gets or sets a file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

value.span: 一个文件，该文件包含密钥对或只包含用于对程序集进行签名的公钥。

span.span: The file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器在程序集清单中插入公钥，然后使用私钥对最终的程序集进行签名。The compiler inserts the public key in the assembly manifest and then signs the final assembly with the private key. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/keyf[ile]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyf[ile]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ LinkResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.LinkResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要链接到程序集的资源文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource files to link to an assembly.

value.span: 要链接到程序集的资源文件。

span.span: The resource files to link to an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该资源成为程序集的组成部分，但不复制该文件。The resource becomes part of the assembly, but the file is not copied. 传递给此参数的项可能附加名为 `LogicalName``Target` 和 `Access` 的可选元数据。The items passed in to this parameter may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName`, `Target`, and `Access`. `LogicalName` 元数据用于指定资源的内部标识符。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. `Target` 元数据可以指定任务将文件复制到的路径和文件名，然后将此新文件编译到程序集。The `Target` metadata can specify the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. `Access` 元数据可以设置为 `private`，以使该资源对其他程序集不可见。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/link[resource]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/link[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MainEntryPoint { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MainEntryPoint : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用作将模块转换为可执行文件时的入口点的方法的完全限定名称 (class.method\*\*)。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

value.span: 用作将模块转换为可执行文件时的入口点的方法的完全限定名称 (*class.method*)。

span.span: The fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于 `/main` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/main` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Platform { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Platform : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串限制可运行此代码的平台；必需是下面的某一项：x86、Itanium、x64 或 anycpu。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串限制可运行此代码的平台;必须是 x86、 Itanium、 x64或 anycpu之一。

span.span: A string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认为 `anycpu`。The default is `anycpu`. 此属性对应于 `/platform` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/platform` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

member this.SdkToolsPath : string with get, set

value.span: SDK 工具的路径。

span.span: The path to the SDK tools.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ SourceModules { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.SourceModules : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要编译到程序集中的模块。

span.span: Gets or sets the modules to be compiled into an assembly.

value.span: 要编译到程序集中的模块。

span.span: The modules to be compiled into an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模块将在生成的程序集清单中列出，并且仍需为分布式且可用，以便加载程序集。The modules will be listed in the manifest of the resulting assembly, and will still need to distributed and available in order for the assembly to load. 传递到此参数的项可能具有名为 `Target` 的其他元数据，该元数据指定任务将文件复制到的路径和文件名，然后将此新文件编译到程序集。The items passed into this parameter may have additional metadata called `Target`, which specifies the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)的文档。For more information, see the documentation for [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker). 此属性对应于传递到 Al.exe 没有特定交换机的模块的列表。This property corresponds to the list of modules passed into Al.exe without a specific switch.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置输出文件的文件格式：library（代码库）、exe（控制台应用程序）或 win（基于 Windows 的应用程序）。

span.span: Gets or sets the file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

value.span: 输出文件的文件格式： 库 (代码库) 、 exe (控制台应用程序) 或 win (基于 Windows 的应用程序) 。

span.span: The file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认为 `library`。The default is `library`. 此属性对应于 `/t[arget]` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/t[arget]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TemplateFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TemplateFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集，除区域性字段之外的所有程序集元数据都从该程序集继承。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

value.span: 除区域性字段之外的所有程序集元数据都从其继承的程序集。

span.span: The assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的程序集必须具有强名称。The specified assembly must have a strong name. 使用 `TemplateFile` 参数创建的程序集将成为附属程序集。An assembly that you create with the `TemplateFile` parameter will be a satellite assembly. 此属性对应于 `/template` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/template` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集中的 Title 字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the Title field in the assembly.

value.span: 程序集中的 " 标题 " 字段。

span.span: The Title field in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/title` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/title` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

protected: virtual property System::String ^ ToolName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回要执行的工具的名称。

span.span: Return the name of the tool to execute.

value.span: 工具的名称。

span.span: The name of the tool.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Trademark { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Trademark : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集中的 Trademark 字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the Trademark field in the assembly.

value.span: 程序集中的 " 商标 " 字段。

span.span: The Trademark field in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/trade[mark]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/trade[mark]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Version { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Version : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此程序集的版本信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the version information for this assembly.

value.span: 此程序集的版本信息。

span.span: The version information for this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的格式是 *major.minor.build.revision*。The format of the string is *major.minor.build.revision*. 默认值为 0。The default value is 0. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/v[ersion]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/v[ersion]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Icon { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Win32Icon : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在程序集中插入的 .ico 文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the .ico file to insert in the assembly.

value.span: 要在程序集中插入的 .ico 文件。

span.span: The .ico file to insert in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Ico 文件在 Windows 资源管理器中提供所需的输出文件外观。The .ico file gives the output file the desired appearance in Windows Explorer. 此属性对应于 `/win32icon` [Al.exe (程序集链接器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中的选项。This property corresponds to the `/win32icon` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).

member this.Win32Resource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个要插入到输出文件中的 Win32 资源（.res 文件）。

span.span: Gets or sets a Win32 resource (.res file) to insert in the output file.

value.span: 要插入到输出文件中的 Win32 资源（.res 文件）。

span.span: The Win32 resource (.res file) to insert in the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker)中 `/win32res` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/win32res` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](/dotnet/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker).
